name: Oyster Project
description:
Oyster Project is a visual novel developed during Global Game Jam 2018.

Your Spaceship crashes and you lost contact with every crew member. You have a certain amount of time before your oxigen expires to figure out how to survive.

You try to communicate with other people using the spaceship's communicator but some messages are being twisted... Try to find each logic behind each conversation and save your friends!

Click on the shinny red thing at the beggining to start.

*There is a known bug where you have to scroll up the screen every conversation you start if the text is blank.
___________________
